Title: War Horse
Production_Co: DreamWorks SKG, Reliance Entertainment, Amblin Entertainment
Cast: Jeremy Irvine, Peter Mullan, Emily Watson, Niels Arestrup, David Thewlis, Tom Hiddleston, Benedict Cumberbatch, Celine Buckens, Toby Kebbell, Patrick Kennedy, Leonard Carow, David Kross, Matt Milne, Robert Emms, Eddie Marsan
Plot: Young Albert enlists to serve in World War I after his beloved horse is sold to the cavalry. Albert's hopeful journey takes him out of England and to the front lines as the war rages on. Young Albert enlists to serve in World War I after his beloved horse is sold to the cavalry. Albert's hopeful journey takes him out of England and to the front lines as the war rages on.
Keywords: world war one, horse, cavalry, british, barbed wire
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 67 nominations.
Location: Ditsworthy Warren House, Sheepstor, Devon, England, UK
Actors: Jeremy Irvine, Emily Watson, David Thewlis
Writer: Lee Hall (screenplay), Richard Curtis (screenplay) | 2 more credits »
Description: Directed by Steven Spielberg.  With Jeremy Irvine, Emily Watson, David Thewlis, Benedict Cumberbatch. Young Albert enlists to serve in World War I after his beloved horse is sold to the cavalry. Albert's hopeful journey takes him out of England and to the front lines as the war rages on.
